description.en:
After half a century, we meet the masked hero who appears with
the decisive line, "Gozonji Tsubakuro Hood!!'' !! Tsubakuro Hood, a master of swords and guns, runs through an era of turmoil with his beloved horse Goro to fight the evil that disturbs peace. !! Synopsis : Heita Mutsumi goes on a journey to avenge an enemy, but by chance he gets caught up in a conflict between the pro-Imperial faction and the Sabaku faction, and ends up calling himself Tsubakuro Hood, a messenger of justice. After half a century, Takashi Horie's early full-length period drama is proudly reprinted!! Commentary The period drama manga "Tsubakuro Hood'', which was serialized in Houbunsha's "Exciting Book'' for about three years in 1957, is the master of action manga Horie Taku: This is an early work and the first long-term serialized work. When Takashi Horie first debuted, he only published short stories that were complete in one episode, and " Tsubakuro one of the characters in the swordsman manga "Hien Itto-ryu'' that was published in the February issue of "Kikai Book'' in 1957. It was nothing more than a black and white hood . However, due to its popularity with readers, Tsubakuro . This time , in response to the requests of many historical drama manga fans and Horie fans, we have decided to reprint all eight volumes of the previously published books. This work can be said to be the foundation for Takashi Horie's masterpieces "Kennosuke Yaguruma'', "Tenma Tenpei'', and "Akai Fusha '', and the settings and depictions that can be seen in his later works are sure to greatly entertain fans!!
